segments.text: I see the woman completely absorbed in drying the plate, oblivious to the water spilling over the sink.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Itâ€™s almost funny how completely unaware she is of the chaos behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water just keeps pouring, creating a real mess on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't help but feel nervous watching that boy on the stool, it looks so unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's eager face as she waits for a cookie is both endearing and alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it's so typical of kids to take risks like this without a second thought.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The sunlight streaming through the window makes everything look so peaceful, so contrasting with what is really happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
